content: **knitted hat and neck-warmer in drops daisy or drops karisma the hat and neck-warmer are worked bottom up in rib and stocking stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the creme caramel neck-warmer pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #cremecaramelset drops design pattern da-047 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- * **whole set** **sizes** s/m m/l - l/xl **yarn for whole set** drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 250-300-300 g colour 13 almond or use drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 300-350-350 g colour 91 almond ------------------------------------------------------- * **hat** **sizes** s/m m/l - l/xl fits head-size 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm **yarn for hat** drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-100 g colour 13 almond or use drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-150 g colour 91 almond **needles for hat** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge for hat** 22 stitches in width and 30 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/261-53-creme-caramel-neck-warmer
